name: Cy Gerber, Cyber Burglar
description:
Made for MiniJam 55.

A stealth game in which Cy Gerber hacks the mainframe and steals all the cyber-treasure.

Written in Javascript using TextPad.

The font is Barcade Brawl (https://www.fontspace.com/barcade-brawl-font-f31534)

Songs are Wild Pogo and Djinn by Francis Preve (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHF8dGfnDzTO-8K5mYMohXA)
